title: Sulvoku
description: Front-End application that simulates a sudoku generator/solver utilizing a backtracking algorithm.

title: Gains
description: M.E.R.N stack app that allows visitors to create, track, and complete crowd-sourced exercise challenges to receive badges. (Hosted on render.com please give it a few minutes to become active)

title: Pass Genny
description: M.E.R.N stack app that allows users to generate a password and store up to 5 passwords. (Hosted on render.com please give it a few minutes to become active)

title: Peety Coffee Counter
description: Slack bot that utilizes REST API to track a weekly coffee consumption leaderboard, using user information and slash commands.

title: Stockify
description: Email notifier that alerts a user when a product is in stock by web scraping HTML.

title: Foogle
description: Recreation of Google homepage and search results using HTML/CSS.

title: Tennis World
description: My first static website to welcome newcomers to the sport of tennis. (Subscription does not work)

title: Sudoku
description: Python command-line interface (CLI) program that solves Sudoku puzzles using a backtracking algorithm with recursion as the solver.
